name: flexible-metric-optimization
description: A wrapper for docker-compose to set env vars and make running easier

scripts.build: docker build --build-arg gid=$(id -g) --build-arg uid=$(id -u) . -t tf-fmo-nogpu -f docker/Dockerfile-nogpu
scripts.torch-build: docker build --build-arg gid=$(id -g) --build-arg uid=$(id -u) . -t torch-fmo-nogpu -f docker/Dockerfile-torch-nogpu

author: Nathan Tsoi <nathan.tsoi@yale.edu>
